document_data.name: Laeros Assumbar
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Laeros Assumbar''' was the patriarch of the [[Assumbar]] noble family of [[Waterdeep]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Laeros funded the majority of the [[Chapel and Chalice of the Divine Right]]'s expenses. The Chapel, which was located within the [[Assumbar Villa]], was dedicated to [[Siamorphe]]. Laeros was pleased with the positive attention the Chapel and Siamorphe's worship brought to his family.
document_data.Relationships: Laeros married Lady [[Kerri Assumbar|Kerri]] of the [[Gulderhorn]] family. Their children were [[Harlaa Assumbar|Harlaa]]{{Cite web enhancement/Noble Houses of Waterdeep|2}}
